mapper.select: select e.*, (select department_name from departments where e.department_id = department_id) department_name, (select job_title from jobs where e.job_id = job_id) job_titile from employees e order by employee_id
select e.*, d.department_name, j.job_title from employees e inner join departments d on e.department_id = d.department_id inner join jobs j on e.job_id = j.job_id where employee_id = #{id}
